response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and my desire to ensure you receive a substantial benefit. I trust that this proposal will meet your expectations and aligns with your valuation of the product. Should you have any questions or wish to proceed with the purchase, please let me know at your earliest convenience. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
